moduleInfo.moduleTitle: Basic Theory and Practices/01 The Big Picture on Short Form/Introduction to Short Form

overview.quote: Short-form content is not just about being brief - it's about being impactful.
overview.introText: Welcome to your journey into short-form content creation. We'll explore how to make every second count in your videos.

keyTerms.definition: The first 3 seconds of your content that grabs viewer attention and stops the scroll.
The percentage of your video that viewers watch before leaving.
The speed at which users typically scroll through their feed.

actionPlan: Write 3 hook ideas for your content

mainContent.title: The Power of Short Form
mainContent.text: Short-form content allows you to reach more people with less production time, making it perfect for consistent content creation.

mainContent.title: Platform Dynamics
mainContent.text: Each platform has unique characteristics that affect how your content performs and reaches your audience.

proTips.text: Film in portrait mode at 9:16 ratio to maximize screen real estate across all platforms.
Keep your most valuable content in the middle 70% of the screen for better cross-platform compatibility.

finalWords.description: Your first videos won't be perfect, but each one gets you closer to mastery.
